examples.name: Morning Meditation
examples.goal: Establish a daily meditation practice for mental clarity and stress reduction
examples.description: A daily 10-minute meditation practice to start each day with mindfulness and intention
examples.motivation: To reduce stress, improve focus, and cultivate inner peace
examples.tracking_method: Check-in after completion with mood rating and reflection notes

milestones.reward_message: Congratulations! You've built the foundation of your meditation practice.
Amazing! Meditation is becoming a natural part of your daily routine.
Incredible! You've successfully established a lasting meditation habit.

steps.instructions: Find a quiet space and sit comfortably
steps.feedback: Great start! You're creating space for mindfulness.

steps.instructions: Close your eyes and focus on your breath for 8 minutes

reminders.message: Time for your morning meditation! Find your quiet space.
How did your meditation feel today? Take a moment to reflect.

examples.name: Weekly Workout
examples.goal: Build consistent fitness routine with 3 weekly strength training sessions
examples.description: Three structured workout sessions per week focusing on strength building and cardiovascular health
examples.motivation: To improve physical strength, energy levels, and overall health
examples.tracking_method: Log workout completion, exercises performed, and energy level

milestones.reward_message: Fantastic! You've established a solid fitness foundation.
Outstanding! Your fitness routine is becoming second nature.
Incredible! You've transformed your fitness and built lasting habits.

steps.feedback: Great start to the week! You're building upper body strength.

steps.instructions: Lower body and core workout - 45 minutes

steps.feedback: Outstanding! You're completing your weekly fitness goals.

reminders.message: Time for your workout! Get ready to build strength.
How did your workout feel? You're getting stronger every session!

examples.name: Learn Spanish
examples.goal: Achieve conversational Spanish proficiency through structured learning
examples.description: A progressive language learning program with daily practice and weekly milestones
examples.motivation: To communicate with Spanish speakers and expand cultural understanding
examples.tracking_method: Track daily practice time, vocabulary learned, and speaking confidence

milestones.completion_criteria: Learn 200 essential words and basic greetings
milestones.reward_message: ¡Excelente! You've built your Spanish vocabulary foundation.
¡Fantástico! You're having real conversations in Spanish!

milestones.completion_criteria: Complete 3-month course and pass intermediate assessment

steps.feedback: ¡Muy bien! You're expanding your Spanish vocabulary.
steps.success_criteria: Correctly recall 10 words from previous day

steps.instructions: Practice daily conversations with language app
Write simple sentences about your day
steps.feedback: ¡Muy bien escrito! Your Spanish writing is improving.
steps.success_criteria: Write 3 sentences daily for 5 days per week

steps.instructions: Have real conversations with native speakers
steps.success_criteria: Complete 2 conversations per week with native speakers

reminders.message: ¡Hora de estudiar español! Time for your Spanish lesson.
¿Cómo te fue hoy? How did your Spanish practice go?
